title: 820-3332, i think GPU problem
message:
820-3332 boot to the logo then restart. 
i replaced the solder of U8900, didn't work,
then I replaced the GPU, it booted once and it had PPVCORE_GPU then it keeps restarting
any ideas ?

title: 820-3332, i think GPU problem
message: Disable GPU; info already posted on the forum, I suppose...
